fish.name: European Pike
fish.description: Olive green, shading from yellow to white along the belly. Have very sharp and numerous teeth

fish.name: European perch
fish.description: Greenish with red pelvic, anal and caudal fins. They have five to eight dark vertical bars on their sides.

fish.name: Atlantic salmon
fish.description: While young they have blue and red spots. At maturity, they take on a silver-blue sheen.Adults have black spots predominantly above the lateral line
fish.location: Baltic sea, Curonian Lagoon, in Nemunas from Baltic sea to Kaunas hydroelectric power plant
fish.bestToCatchSeason: During breeding season in legal places

fish.name: Sea lamprey
fish.description: Has an eel-like body without paired fins. Its mouth is jawless, round and sucker-like, and as wide or wider than the head; sharp teeth are arranged in many consecutive circular rows.
